protocol.description: This protocol allows a privileged client to turn on HID accessibility features.

enum.name: modifier
enum.description: These values indicate modifier keys that can be latched by Sticky Keys

request.name: set_enabled
request.description: Sets whether Sticky Keys is enabled or disabled.

arg.name: enabled
arg.summary: Whether Sticky Keys is enabled or disabled

event.name: sticky_keys_enabled
event.description: The event tells the client that the activation state of Sticky Keys has changed.

arg.name: enabled
arg.summary: Whether Sticky Keys is enabled or disabled

event.name: sticky_keys_held
event.description: The event tells the client that the keys that Sticky Keys is holding has changed.

arg.name: keys
arg.summary: The keys that Sticky Keys is holding

event.name: sticky_keys_latched
event.description: The event tells the client that the keys that Sticky Keys has latched has changed.

arg.name: keys
arg.summary: The keys that Sticky Keys has latched
